title: Cheese Pizza
about: Your favorite cheese pizza made with classic marinara sauce topped with mozzarella cheese.

title: Pepperoni Pizza
about: This gourmet pizza is ideal for easy late night delivery, complete with mozzarella cheese and pepperoni.

title: Meat Lover's® Pizza
about: Meat lover's pizza is the perfect game day pizza, packed with pepperoni, Italian sausage, ham, bacon, seasoned pork and beef.

title: Supreme Pizza
about: Enjoy this freshly prepared pizza for family dinner or a group lunch, including pepperoni, seasoned pork, green bell peppers and red onions.

title: Create Your Own
about: Create your own pizza with Pizza Hut's quality ingredients and crusts. Onions, sausage, peppers, olives, pineapple—whatever you crave!
